title: Style BasedOn - Multiple inheritance, DynamicResources
body: Currently you can only set a Style's BasedOn to one other style (With out a custom markup extension). This should be changed to be a bit more like CSS and allow multiple inheritance. The benefit is that you could give a button a "LeftNavigationButton" style AND a "VeryImportantButton" style.

comments.body:
Yes please. XAML styles are very limiting compared to CSS.
But sadly it seems this has been requested many times and rejected:
Good suggestion. I actually think WPF should use CSS for styling. It is so much better.
